meanings.definition: A nonfiction film or television program that presents facts and information about a specific subject.
meanings.sent1: I watched a documentaries about penguins and learned a lot.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy watching documentaries to learn new things.
meanings.sent3: The documentaries about ants was surprisingly entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a series of documentaries, each revealing a different chapter.
meanings.sent5: The documentaries on space exploration were so fascinating.

meanings.definition: To create a documentary film or television program.
meanings.sent1: She documentaries her trip to the zoo for a school project.
meanings.sent2: Filmmakers documentaries to share important stories with the world.
meanings.sent3: He documentaries his cooking adventures with humor and flair.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship documentaries the journey of two unlikely companions.
meanings.sent5: Documentariesing the history of ancient civilizations requires thorough research.
